name: BitBoard
description: Bitboard (BB) coin is developed on the Polygon as a 100% Decentralized AI Blockchain, and is currently developing its own network called 'Tnet'. Development is ongoing according to the roadmap, and the Testnet is currently in operation. The Bitboard ranking chart, where anyone can easily vote for their favorite star at anytime, provides instant finality, high TPS that meets real-world use cases, and reduces the cost of running blockchain applications, thereby reducing the entry barrier for end users, which solves the problems of existing blockchains.
